sense.gloss: to lean (to one side), to incline
to be unbalanced (e.g. diet), to be unduly weighted towards, to be concentrated on
to be partial, to be biased, to be prejudiced

sdata.j: ハンバーガーばかり↑食↑↓た↓べていると、↑栄養↑↓えいよう↓が|↑偏↑↓かたよ↓る|よ。
sdata.e: Your diet is going to be really unbalanced if all you eat is hamburgers.
